attributes.action: To Save Fylde's Post Offices from possible closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since your Government came to power in 1997 the Borough of Fylde has lost one quater of its post offices.  Fylde is a collection of small rural villages and larger urban areas.  we can't afford any more to go.  Please make a commitment that no more will go in Fylde.
